name: PhotoPuzzler
description:
PhotoPuzzler

aim of game is to progress through the building. Press E to pick up special objects (glows in thermal) and use them to open specific doors

Lead Design - Oluwamayowa Akinola (Me)

Design Team -  Keith Connors, Sean O’Dalaigh-Pulford

Tech - Oluwamayowa Akinola (Me),  Keith Connors

Production - Oluwamayowa Akinola (Me)

Art & Animations - Sean O’Dalaigh-Pulford

Any feedback however small will be helpful!

WASD - move

F - thermal camera

E - interact

Q - go back in certain modes

Mouse - camera movement

Assets used -

Standard Assets - by Unity Technology

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-32351

Decrepit Dungeon Lite - by Prodigious Creations

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/decrepit-dungeon-lite-33936

Thermal Vision Free - by QQ.D.Y

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/thermal-vision-free-56092

Audio -

Door opening - by InspectorJ

https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/346212/

Door unlocking - by Jagadamba

https://freesound.org/people/Jagadamba/sounds/387713/

Key pickup - by zmobie

https://freesound.org/people/zmobie/sounds/319806/

Background music - by Arianne Von

(No link to file or official contact  as of yet)
